channel.title: Member
channel.description: can someone tell me how to add member to my server. Like making items and wepons for members only

item.title: Member
item.dc:creator: @alexsasha2 alexsasha2
item.description:
@alexsasha2 wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####)
{
if(playerRights < #) {
sendMessage(“You do not sufficient rights to equip this item.”);
remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], playerWeapon);
}
}
Put it under boolean process() IN CLIENT!!!. As seen up there change the #### to the item ID. change the # in if(playerRights < #) to either 0,1,2,or 3.

As up there it says (playerEquipment[playerWeapon], playerWeapon change both of the “Weapon” to the slot of equipment the item you are doing this on if it is a weapon you’re doing this on keep it the same.

Example
playerWeapon
playerShield
playerHat
playerRing
playerCape
playerAmulet
playerChest
playerLegs
playerHands
playerFeet
playerArrows

Credits go to cloud7strife i take no credit for this because this is cloud6strife’s work not mine so if your gonna rep someone you should rep him not me

Read full topic
